review: This does not work with older TVs. Even though my Sony TV has an HDMI port, there is no audio or ability to view Netflix and Amazon prime videos. This was not mentioned anywhere on the Amazon site or in their support documentation but customer service told me the news. Just wasted a couple hours of my life trying to get it to work that could have been avoided.
author: Jc

review: Although certainly less than perfection, -a  low-cost way for viewing internet video on your TV.  Set up is easy and mostly works properly.Have two Fire Sticks, both of which work the same---Daily they will lock-up, providing a HOME not available message.  The fix is to briefly disconnect (unplug power cord) Fire Stick, then re-connect to solve problem.  Internet video viewed with Sony Blu-Ray DVD player on same network never has lock-up issues like Fire TV Stick.  Most apps work fine, a few others such as Wall Street J. not so good.
author: D W Flemming "Don"
